description:
As a hero, Meguru wants to investigate the "black rose man" who`s been causing trouble around the school. Miruku, thinking that it`s dangerous for a middle schooler to be walking around by herself, asks an elderly male friend of hers, Nagatsuki, to accompany her. What will their investigation reveal?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Legendary Monster, the Black Rose Man!
Uwasa no Kaijin: Kuro Bara Otoko
うわさの怪人・黒薔薇男!
